pkgmetadata.longdescription: # kraken-core[![Python application](https://github.com/kraken-build/kraken-core/actions/workflows/python-package.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kraken-build/kraken-core/actions/workflows/python-package.yml)[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/kraken-core.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/kraken-core)Kraken is a task orchestration system with a focus on ease of configuration and flexibility.
